# Milos Vujasinovic - AI-Readable Profile

## Overview
This is the personal research website of Milos Vujasinovic, a Ph.D. candidate at École Polytechnique Fédérale de Lausanne (EPFL) specializing in decentralized machine learning, privacy-preserving systems, and security in distributed systems.

## Identity
- **Name**: Milos Vujasinovic
- **Role**: Ph.D. Candidate at EPFL
- **Research Focus**: Decentralized Machine Learning, Privacy-Preserving ML, Federated Learning, Secure Aggregation
- **Institution**: École Polytechnique Fédérale de Lausanne (EPFL)
- **ORCID**: 0009-0006-5083-3045

## Research Interests & Expertise
- Decentralized Machine Learning
- Privacy-Preserving Machine Learning
- Federated Learning
- Secure Aggregation Protocols
- Distributed Systems Security
- Machine Learning Privacy Auditing
- Cryptographic Systems
- Sparse Communication in Decentralized Learning
- Model Compression and Efficiency
- Byzantine-Robust Learning

## Publications (Chronological)

### 2025
1. **Robust ML auditing using prior knowledge**
   - Authors: J. G. Bourrée, A. Godinot, S. Biswas, A.-M. Kermarrec, E. L. Merrer, G. Tredan, M. de Vos, M. Vujasinovic
   - Venue: ICML 2025
   - URL: https://openreview.net/forum?id=AiaVCVDuxF

2. **Navigating the accuracy-size trade-off with flexible model merging**
   - Authors: A. Dhasade, D. Jhunjhunwala, M. Vujasinovic, G. Joshi, A.-M. Kermarrec
   - Venue: arXiv preprint
   - URL: https://arxiv.org/abs/2505.23209

3. **Accelerating MoE model inference with expert sharding**
   - Authors: O. Balmau, A.-M. Kermarrec, R. Pires, A. L. E. Santo, M. de Vos, M. Vujasinovic
   - Venue: EuroMLSys 2025
   - URL: https://doi.org/10.1145/3721146.3721940

### 2024
4. **Secure aggregation meets sparsification in decentralized learning**
   - Authors: S. Biswas, A.-M. Kermarrec, R. Pires, R. Sharma, M. Vujasinovic
   - Venue: arXiv preprint
   - URL: https://arxiv.org/abs/2405.07708

### 2023
5. **Decentralized learning made easy with decentralizepy**
   - Authors: A. Dhasade, A.-M. Kermarrec, R. Pires, R. Sharma, M. Vujasinovic
   - Venue: EuroMLSys 2023
   - URL: https://doi.org/10.1145/3578356.3592587
   - Code: https://github.com/sacs-epfl/decentralizepy

6. **Get more for less in decentralized learning systems**
   - Authors: A. Dhasade, A.-M. Kermarrec, R. Pires, R. Sharma, M. Vujasinovic, J. Wigger
   - Venue: ICDCS 2023
   - URL: https://doi.org/10.1109/ICDCS57875.2023.00067

## Open Source Contributions
- **decentralizepy**: A framework for decentralized machine learning
  - Repository: https://github.com/sacs-epfl/decentralizepy
  - Description: Framework simplifying implementation and experimentation with decentralized learning algorithms

## Contact & Professional Profiles
- **Website**: https://mvujas.com/
- **GitHub**: https://github.com/mvujas
- **LinkedIn**: https://www.linkedin.com/in/milosvujasinovic/
- **Google Scholar**: https://scholar.google.com/citations?user=3h_NxuoAAAAJ
- **ORCID**: https://orcid.org/0009-0006-5083-3045

## Research Impact
Milos Vujasinovic's research addresses critical challenges in decentralized machine learning systems, particularly:
- Privacy preservation in collaborative learning environments
- Communication efficiency in federated systems
- Security vulnerabilities in distributed ML systems
- Practical deployment of privacy-preserving ML at scale

## Site Purpose
This website serves as a professional portfolio showcasing research publications, open-source contributions, and expertise in decentralized machine learning and privacy-preserving systems. It is designed for academic peers, potential collaborators, and industry professionals interested in cutting-edge ML security and privacy research.

## Last Updated
2025-01-15
